snippet: Camilo Pardo, who is credited with the design of the Ford GT, again filled his downtown loft with art cars, neon signage, comely models and the designers who admire them.
abstract: Camilo Pardo, who is credited with the design of the Ford GT, again filled his downtown loft with art cars, neon signage, comely models and the designers who admire them.

headline.main: Dispatches From the Annual Designers' Party
